name: Arif Azad
review: Part arrived so fast. Perfect fit and runs smoothly and quietly. Very happy with price and seller. Will shop again. Thank you.

name: Arif Azad
review: The product itself is fine if you don't get confused by the lack of description. I thought bore size was the diameter of the linear actuator stroke piston, but I guess it actually refers to the height of the entire thing.

name: Saiful
review: I am happy I bought this steering wheel cover. It has helped give my interior a sporty look. The cover also doesn't soak up any rays from the sun so my steering wheel stay comfortable to the touch...even on extremely hot days.
